name: Hoverboard Simulator
description:
Hoverboard Simulator is a fun way to test out the new craze on your device. Hold on as you cruise the streets and collect money to buy new boards. Watch out for cars and other hazards on the road and try and stop the hoverboards from crashing and catching on fire.

How to Play:

-Swipe to move the board from side to side
-Avoid obstacles and pick up cash
